sent.orig: The first week on March passed already.
sent.trans: 三月的首个星期巳经(already)过去(passed)。

sent.orig: Huang Xingguo said that the happy blueprint already drew, the bugle which advances boldly already sounded.
sent.trans: 黄兴国说，美好的蓝图已经绘就，奋进的号角已经吹响。

sent.orig: She already fluffed that pillow. You already fluffed It's fine.
sent.trans: 她已经拍松过那个枕头。摩妮卡，你已经拍过了枕头了？

sent.orig: From which we see, here has policy already, have measure, have a process already, have target.
sent.trans: 从中我们看到，这里既有方针，有又步骤，既有过程，有又目标。

sent.orig: Those who already battalion to already became market fractionize is inevitable.
sent.trans: 分业经营已成为市场细分之必然。
